Title: Relates to permitting any New York resident to receive a free coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) vaccination
Summary: Requires New York to cover the cost of the COVID-19 vaccination for any New York resident who is ineligible to receive a COVID-19 vaccination at no cost under a federal program.
ActClause: AN ACT permitting New York residents to receive a coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) vaccine at no cost
